titles.title: He is Lord - He is Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v2 v2 v3 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
He is Lord - He is Lord
I know it in my spirit
He is Lord - He is Lord
I know it in my heart

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He is Lord - He is Lord
Alive and arisen
He is Lord - He is Lord
He is Lord

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
You're my Lord - You're my Lord
I know it in my spirit
You're my Lord - You're my Lord
I know it in my heart

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
You're my Lord - You're my Lord
Alive and arisen
You're my Lord - You're my Lord
You're my Lord

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
You're our Lord - You're our Lord
We know it in our spirit
You're our Lord - You're our Lord
We know it in our heart

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
You're our Lord - You're our Lord
Alive and arisen
You're our Lord - You're our Lord
You're our Lord

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
He is here - He is here
I know it in my spirit
He is here - He is here
I know it in my heart

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
He is here - He is here
Alive and arisen
He is here - He is here
He is here
